Variable.Name: lon
Long.name: Longitude
Description: longitude at center of each grid cell

Variable.Name: lat
Long.name: Latitude
Description: latitude at center of each grid cell

Variable.Name: lon_bnds
Long.name: Longitude west-east bounds
Description: (west boundary of grid cell, east boundary of grid cell)

Variable.Name: lat_bnds
Long.name: Latitude south-north bounds
Description: (south boundary of grid cell, north boundary of grid cell)

Variable.Name: time
Long.name: Time middle averaging period
Description: julian days days since 1700-01-01 00:00:00 UTC for middle of time averaging period Proleptic_Gregorianc calendar

Variable.Name: time_bnds
Long.name: Time beginning-end bounds
Description: (julian days days since 1700-01-01 beginning time ave period, julian days days since 1700-01-01 end time ave period)

Variable.Name: dec_date
Long.name: Decimal date middle averaging period
Description: decimal date in fractional years for middle of time averaging period

Variable.Name: dec_date_bnds
Long.name: Decimal date beginning-end bounds
Description: (decimal date beginningﾠﾠtime ave period, decimal date end time ave period)

Variable.Name: cal_date_mid
Units: yr, mon, day, hr, min, sec
Long.name: Calender date middle averaging period
Description: calender date middle of time ave period: year, month, day, hour, minute, second for UTC time zone

Variable.Name: cal_date_beg
Units: yr, mon, day, hr, min, sec
Long.name: Calender date beginning averaging period
Description: calender date beginning of time ave period: year, month, day, hour, minute, second for UTC time zone

Variable.Name: cal_date_end
Units: yr, mon, day, hr, min, sec
Long.name: Calender date end averaging period
Description: calender date end of time ave period: year, month, day, hour, minute, second for UTC time zone

Variable.Name: GPP
Long.name: Gross Primary Productivity
Description: Rate of photosynthesis (always positive)

Variable.Name: NPP
Long.name: Net Primary Productivity
Description: Net Primary Productivity (NPP=GPP-AutoResp, positive into plants)

Variable.Name: TotalResp
Long.name: Total Respiration
Description: Total respiration (TotalResp=AutoResp+heteroResp, always positive)

Variable.Name: AutoResp
Long.name: Autotrophic Respiration
Description: Autotrophic respiration rate (always positive)

Variable.Name: HeteroResp
Long.name: Heterotrophic Respiration
Description: Heterotrophic respiration rate (always positive)

Variable.Name: DOC_flux
Long.name: Dissolved Organic Carbon flux
Description: Loss of organic carbon dissolved in ground water or rivers (positive out of grid cell)

Variable.Name: Fire_flux
Long.name: Fire emissions
Description: Flux of carbon due to fires (always positive)

Variable.Name: NEE
Long.name: Net Ecosystem Exchange
Description: Net Ecosystem Exchange (NEE=HeteroResp+AutoResp-GPP, positive into atmosphere)

Variable.Name: poolname
Long.name: Name of each Carbon Pool
Description: Name of each carbon pool (i.e., \"wood,\" or \"Coarse Woody Debris\")

Variable.Name: CarbPools
Long.name: Size of each carbon pool
Description: Total size of each carbon pool vertically integrated over the entire soil column

Variable.Name: AbvGrndWood
Long.name: Above ground woody biomass
Description: Total above ground wood biomass

Variable.Name: TotLivBiom
Long.name: Total living biomass
Description: Total carbon content of the living biomass (leaves+roots+wood)

Variable.Name: TotSoilCarb
Long.name: Total Soil Carbon
Description: Total soil and litter carbon content vertically integrated over the enire soil column

Variable.Name: LAI
Long.name: Leaf Area Index
Description: Area of leaves per area ground

Variable.Name: Qh
Long.name: Sensible heat
Description: Sensible heat flux into the boundary layer (positive into atmosphere)

Variable.Name: Qle
Long.name: Latent heat
Description: Latent heat flux into the boundary layer (positive into atmosphere)

Variable.Name: Evap
Long.name: Total Evaporation
Description: Sum of all evaporation sources (positive into atmosphere)

Variable.Name: TVeg
Long.name: Transpiration
Description: Total Plant transpiration (always positive)

Variable.Name: LW_albedo
Long.name: Longwave Albedo
Description: Longwave Albedo

Variable.Name: SW_albedo
Long.name: Shortwave Albedo
Description: Shortwave albedo

Variable.Name: Lwnet
Long.name: Net Longwave Radiation
Description: Incident longwave radiation minusﾠﾠsimulated outgoing longwave radiation (positive into grnd)

Variable.Name: SWnet
Long.name: Net shortwave radiation
Description: Incident shortwave radiation minusﾠﾠsimulated outgoing shortwave radiation (positive into grnd)

Variable.Name: fPAR
Long.name: Absorbed fraction incoming PAR
Description: absorbed fraction incoming photosyntetically active radiation

Variable.Name: z_top
Long.name: Soil Layer Top Depth
Description: Depth from soil surface to top of soil layer

Variable.Name: z_node
Long.name: Soil Layer Node Depth
Description: Depth from soil surface to layer prognostic variables; typically center of soil layer

Variable.Name: z_bottom
Long.name: Soil Layer Bottom Depth
Description: Depth from soil surface to bottom of soil layer

Variable.Name: SoilMoist
Long.name: Average Layer Soil Moisture
Description: Soil water content in each soil layer, includingﾠﾠliquid, vapor and ice

Variable.Name: SoilMoistFrac
Long.name: Average Layer Fraction of Saturation
Description: Fraction of saturation of soil water in each soil layer, includingﾠﾠliquid and ice

Variable.Name: SoilWet
Long.name: Total Soil Wetness
Description: Vertically integrated soil moisture divided by maximum allowable soil moisture above wilting point

Variable.Name: Qs
Long.name: Surface runoff
Description: Runoff from the landsurface and/or subsurface stormflow

Variable.Name: Qsb
Long.name: Subsurface runoff
Description: Gravity soil water drainage and/or soil water lateral flow

Variable.Name: SoilTemp
Long.name: Average Layer Soil Temperature
Description: Average soil temperature in each soil layer

Variable.Name: Tdepth
Long.name: Active Layer Thickness
Description: Thaw depth; depth to zero centigrade isotherm in permafrost

Variable.Name: Fdepth
Long.name: Frozen Layer Thickness
Description: Freeze depth; depth to zero centigrade isotherm in non-permafrost

Variable.Name: Tcan
Long.name: Canopy Temperature
Description: Canopy or vegetation temperature (or temperature used in photosynthesis calculations)

Variable.Name: SWE
Long.name: Snow Water Equivalent
Description: Total water mass of snow pack, including ice and liquid water

Variable.Name: SnowDen
Long.name: Bulk Snow Density
Description: Overall bulk density of the snow pack, including ice and liquid water

Variable.Name: SnowDepth
Long.name: Total snow depth
Description: Total snow depth

Variable.Name: CO2air
Long.name: Near surface CO2 concentration
Description: Near surface dry air CO2 mole fraction

Variable.Name: LWdown
Long.name: Surface incident longwave radiation
Description: Surface incident longwave radiation

Variable.Name: Psurf
Long.name: Surface pressure
Description: Surface pressure

Variable.Name: Qair
Long.name: Near surface specific humidity
Description: Near surface specific humidity

Variable.Name: Rainf
Long.name: Rainfall rate
Description: Rainfall rate

Variable.Name: SWdown
Long.name: Surface incident shortwave radiation
Description: Surface incident shortwave radiation

Variable.Name: Tair
Long.name: Near surface air temperature
Description: Near surface air temperature

Variable.Name: Wind
Long.name: Near surface module of the wind
Description: Near surface wind magnitude

Variable.Name: Tmin
Long.name: Daily Maximum Temperature
Description: Daily Maximum Temperature

Variable.Name: Tmax
Long.name: Daily Minimum Temperature
Description: Daily Minimum Temperature

Variable.Name: Uwind
Long.name: Northward Component of Wind
Description: Northward Component of Wind

Variable.Name: Vwind
Long.name: Eastward Component of Wind
Description: Eastward Component of Wind

Variable.Name: RH
Long.name: Relative Humidity
Description: Relative Humidity
